about_the_game:
Explore a fallen utopia in this action-packed adventure platformer. Harness the weather to find new paths. Fight the untamed machines and seek ways to get their fragile parts for crafting. Become the savior of humanity or its doom.

Experience a big, interconnected world set in a fallen utopia silent apocalypse where humans are in retreat and machines still keep everything clean and ordered but in a chaotic, fascinating way. Encounter different views, personalities and attitudes. Make decisions that will affect people's lives and your own destiny.

FEATURES:

  • Responsive movement with multiple unlockable abilities

  • Impactful weather that enriches exploration in metroidvania style progression

  • Engaging combat rewarding thoughtful actions and enemy observation

  • Customizable playstyle that allows you to adapt to the situation

  • Extensive healing mechanic that encourages you to stay close to the action
